name: You Won't Win (Prototype)
description:
This prototype is one of the hardest one's you will ever play, it gets more difficult as you go on, speeding up to a point where you need to have immense reflexes.

The mode you play is endless, and will go on until you run out of revives. You get three revives, which you can use when you die by pressing R.

CONTROLS

A/D - Left/Right

R - Revive when dead

F1 - Changes the colour scheme

Alpha Keys 1, 2, 3, 4 - Spawn power ups (to play the game the way it was intended, don't use these keys. Power ups will spawn randomly)

ESCAPE - Pause/Unpause (UI is not functional, only key works)

Photo Epilepsy Warning: This game contains bright, flashing lights.
